title: Dell quality
author: VD
content_html:
Dell provides real laptop excitement:

AN INQUIRER READER attending a conference in Japan was sat just feet away from a laptop computer that suddenly exploded into flames, in what could have been a deadly accident. Gaston, our astonished reader reports: “The damn thing was on fire and produced several explosions for more than five minutes”.

I haven’t had the best of luck with Dell laptops myself. I inherited two Latitudes which died a slow, pathetic death of motherboard failure. Anyhow, these pictures just made me laugh.
content_text:
Dell provides
real laptop excitement
:
AN INQUIRER READER attending a conference in Japan was sat just feet away from a laptop computer that suddenly exploded into flames, in what could have been a deadly accident. Gaston, our astonished reader reports: “The damn thing was on fire and produced several explosions for more than five minutes”.
I haven’t had the best of luck with Dell laptops myself.  I inherited two Latitudes which died a slow, pathetic death of motherboard failure.  Anyhow, these pictures just made me laugh.
